model: Stratos Cordless with Clean Sense IQ (IZ862H)
seo_keywords: Shark Stratos cordless brush not spinning

problems.title: Clean Sense IQ Revving / Erratic
problems.description: Motor speeds up and slows down randomly even on clean floors.
possible_causes: Sensors in the nozzle are dirty
solution_steps: Wipe the infrared sensors inside the floor nozzle entry.
Check for hair wrapped around the brush roll.

problems.title: Brush Roll Not Spinning
problems.description: Floor nozzle lights are off or flashing red.
solution_steps: Clean the metal pins on the wand hinge.
Connect the handheld unit directly to the nozzle to test if the wand is broken.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a Stratos Cordless with Clean Sense IQ (IZ862H)?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $598 vacuum, and extending the life of your Shark is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Stratos Cordless with Clean Sense IQ (IZ862H) needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include strange noises and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my Stratos Cordless with Clean Sense IQ (IZ862H) myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
